spec_data.Name: texlive-abbr
spec_data.Description:
The package provides some simple macros to support
abbreviations in Plain TeX or LaTeX. It allows writing (e.g.)
\<TEX> instead of \TeX, hence frees users from having to escape
space after parameterless macros.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:49:41 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Simple macros supporting abreviations for Plain and LaTeX
